messages.title: 3 GOOD REASONS TO VOTE FOR THE WELSH CONSERVATIVES
messages.content: We will appoint a North Wales Minister, giving North Wales a greater voice in Cardiff.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: PROTECTING OUR NORTH WALES HEALTH BUDGET
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to increasing investment in the NHS.
Will abolish business rates for 75% of small businesses and deliver a manufacturing strategy.
Will allow schools control over funding and empower teachers, parents and governors to make decisions.

issues.economy: Will abolish business rates for 75% of small businesses and deliver a manufacturing strategy.
issues.education: Will allow schools control over funding and empower teachers, parents and governors to make decisions.
issues.governance: Will appoint a North Wales Minister, giving North Wales a greater voice in Cardiff.
issues.health: Committed to increasing investment in the NHS.

images.caption: We will hold some Assembly meetings in North Wales.
